title: SFEC Campaign Consultant Report - Vendors
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset contains information about the Vendors and Subvendors section of the Campaign Consultant Report. For more information, visit the Ethics Commission’s webpage on Campaign Consultants. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED Data for this dataset is created when campaign consultants electronically file the following reports with vendors information: Form 3 – Quarterly Disclosure Report for Campaign Consultants Form 6 – Campaign Consultant Termination Statement This dataset contains reports filings starting from December 9, 2024, when electronic filing of campaign consultant reports will be required. C. UPDATE PROCESS The dataset is updated via the Socrata Publisher API as needed when form filings are submitted and signed by campaign consultants. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET The unique row identifier for a vendor entry is “Entry Id”. This dataset should be joined with the SFEC Campaign Consultant Report dataset by “Envelope Id”. E. RELATED DATASETS For detail reporting on campaign consultant activities, visit SFEC Campaign Consultant Report.

columns.name: VendorAndSubvendorList NameOfVendorSubvendor
columns.description: Name of vendor or subvendor who provided campaign-related goods or services to a current client

columns.name: VendorAndSubvendorList Address PostalCode
columns.description: vendor or subvendor address - postal code

columns.name: VendorAndSubvendorList EconomicConsiderationReceived
columns.description: Economic consideration received from vendor or subvendor

columns.name: entry_id
columns.description: Unique entry id of vendor or subvendor

columns.name: FilingSeries
columns.description: Combines consultant name, report type, and report start date
